survey_name: Digital Fitness App User Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather user feedback on digital fitness applications to improve features, usability, and overall user experience.

questions.question_text: Which digital fitness app do you currently use the most?
questions.client_notes: Ensure the 'Other' option includes a text field for user input.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a single-choice dropdown with an optional text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which digital fitness app do you currently use the most?

questions.question_text: How often do you use your digital fitness app?
questions.client_notes: Consider adding a note to clarify 'occasionally' as needed.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How often do you use your digital fitness app?

questions.question_text: Which features do you find most useful in your digital fitness app? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections with a checkbox interface.

script.question_text: Which features do you find most useful in your digital fitness app? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in your digital fitness app?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field to capture detailed feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a text area for open-ended responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in your digital fitness app?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your digital fitness app to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a standard Likert scale for consistency.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your digital fitness app to others?
